examples.example: 我仔细地看着地图，规划着接下来的美好旅程。

translate.english: I carefully looked at the map and planned the next wonderful journey.

examples.example: 我拿着地图，兴致勃勃地开启探索世界的精彩之旅。

translate.english: I hold the map and start the wonderful journey of exploring the world with great enthusiasm.

examples.example: 我和朋友们看着地图，满心期待地计划着下一次的冒险之旅。

translate.english: My friends and I looked at the map, looking forward with full hearts to planning the next adventure trip.
